entry.title: OCCI WG - document #60: OCCI Monitoring
entry.content:
• Assignee changed from Alan Sill to Richard Hughes-Jones

Re-assigned to AD to coordinate with OCCI-WG leadership

entry.title: OCCI WG - document #60: OCCI Monitoring
entry.content:
• Status changed from submitted to author action

Thanks for this, Agusto. Before this goes to review by the steering group, I would like to query your choice of "community practice" for this document. I have looked at it, and think it would be more appropriate as an "informational" document. Would you please look at GFD #152, to confirm your choice?

I see that Richard is also looking into speaking with the WG about the document's status.

Once we hear back from you & Richard, we'll get the standards council review completed prior to public comment. Thanks, and best regards, Greg Newby

entry.title: OCCI WG - document #60: OCCI Monitoring
entry.content:
I looked at gfd152, after Alan's suggestion, and my proposal follows my understanding of that document:
    it can be modified according with the indications of the community.

entry.title: OCCI WG - document #60: OCCI Monitoring
entry.content: Minor status update: this document is awaiting the document from the authors/editors. It is not yet ready for review. Greg

entry.title: OCCI WG - document #60: OCCI Monitoring
entry.content: This document will be moved back to the OCCI issue tracker for further consideration and work by the group.
